title: Technical Solutions Engineer
content:
The Role’s Responsibilities
We’re hiring for a Technical Solutions Engineer, but what actually is that? The role is split into three categories: internal software development, client facing engineering services, and providing support to our Account Management and fulfilment teams.
This role is for engineers that are true entrepreneurs and take on the role of developer, consultant, and platform specialist. Excellent communication skills are a must along with the perseverance to solve problems that may not have obvious solutions. You may need to "Think out of the box" or "hack around" a problem to solve it. We like that!
The Role’s Responsibilities

Handle, collect and analyze large amounts of data using a variety of data solutions like Google Analytics
Collaborate across global teams on the execution of internal/external development and project implementation
Deliver technical consulting services for domestic and international conglomerates
Work as an implementation consultant providing solutions for data collection/design based on customers’ business requirements with knowledge of digital marketing
Provide engineering services along the lines of data integration, platform migration, automating workflows and processes, tag audits and deployments, visualization, and cloud architecture consulting.
Provide technical guidance on complicated platform and implementation issues

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree (Computer Science or Computer Engineering)
2+ years work experience in the relevant fields
Good knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and DOM
Experience querying large databases (SQL) (experience with BigQuery a plus)
Proficiency in one or more of JavaScript (Node.JS), Python, or Java
Working knowledge of GitHub
Experience in practical use of one of major cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, Azure)
Excellent communication skills are a must along with the perseverance to solve problems that may not have obvious solutions. 
Demonstrated ability to communicate technical workflows, challenges, requirements, and solutions to a non-technical, client audience
Strong verbal and written communication skills in English and Korean

Bonus Points

Experience in the analytics tool (Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, etc.)
Experience in ETL, microservices, working with APIs, and analyzing large data sets
Cloud certification (GCP, AWS, Azure)
Experience with mobile app development in Objective-C, Swift, Kotlin, or React Native
Experience/Familiarity with Hybrid mobile app or native iOS/Android development
Exceptional project management, analytical problem solving and troubleshooting skills.
Experience working with global clients and teams

 
Must submit your resume in English!
 
The Role’s Responsibilities (역할 및 책임 소개)
미디어몽크스는 Technical Solution Engineer (SE)를 채용하고 있는 중입니다. Technical SE의 역할은 크게 세 가지로 구성됩니다: 내부소프트웨어 개발 업무, 고객대면 기술서비스 업무, 그리고 자체 AM 지원 업무입니다.
진정한 사업가이면서도 개발자, 컨설턴트, 플렛폼 전문가의 역할을 수행하는 보직으로, 당면한 문제에 대해 곧바로 해결책이 찾아지지 않더라도 틀 밖에서 생각해보고 이리저리 파해쳐 볼 수 있는 끈기와 함께 뛰어난 소통 능력도 필수로 갖추어야 하는 자리입니다. 저희는 그러한 자질을 높이 삽니다.
 
이 직무에서는 다음과 같은 업무를 수행하게 됩니다:

Google Analytics 등 다양한 데이터 솔루션을 이용하여 대용량 데이터 처리 및 수집, 분석
글로벌팀과 내/외부 개발 및 구현 프로젝트 수행
국내외 유수의 대기업 대상 컨설팅 서비스 수행
디지털 데이터 수집기술에 대한 깊은 이해를 바탕으로 고객社의 비즈니스 목적에 따라 데이터 수집/설계를 위한 솔루션 제공 등 솔루션 구현 컨설턴트 역할
데이터 통합, 플랫폼 이동, 업무 흐름 및 절차상의 자동화, 태그 검수와 배포, 시각화 및 클라우드 아키텍처 컨설팅 범위와 관련된 기술적인 서비스 제공
다양한 플랫폼과 구축 이슈에 대한 기술적 가이드 제공

 
Qualifications (자격 요건)

컴퓨터공학 및 관련 전공자 (필수)
유관업계 경험 2+년 (필수) 
HTML/CSS/JavaScript, SQL에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
대용량 데이터베이스 쿼리 경험(SQL, NoSQL)이 있으신 분(BigQuery에 대한 경험은 Plus points)
JavaScript (Node.JS), Python, Java 중 최소 하나 이상에 능숙하신 분
Github을 활용한 코드 관리 및 협업 경험이 있으신 분
주요 클라우드 플랫폼 활용 경험이 있으신 분(GCP, AWS, Azure)
명확한 답이 없는 문제를 원활한 커뮤니케이션과 함께 해결 할 수 있는 능력을 가지신 분
기술적인 workflow, challenges, requirements 등을 개발자가 아닌 고객에게도 원활하게 설명할 수 있는 능력을 가지신 분
영어/한국어를 사용하여 원활한 업무(미팅, 문서 작성 등)가 가능하신 분

Bonus Points

Computer Science 또는 Computer Engineering 전공(학사)
분석 툴 (GA360, Adobe Analytics, etc.) 사용 경험이 있으신 분
ETL, microservices, API 활용, 대용량 데이터 분석 경험이 있으신 분
클라우드 자격증을 보유하신 분(GCP, AWS, Azure)
Objective-C, Swift, Kotlin, or React Native에 대한 모바일 앱 개발 경험이 있으신 분
Android, iOS 개발 작업 경험 혹은 경력이 있으신 분 
기술적인 개념을 기술적 지식이 없는 일반인에게 해석해서 전달하는 능력을 갖추신 분
뛰어난 과제 관리능력과 분석적 문제에 대한 해결 및 기술적 장애에 대한 해결 능력
영어권 국가 및 글로벌 조직에서의 근무 경험

 
영문 이력서 제출About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
Disclaimer: 


Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy

demographic_questions.description:
At Media.Monks, we believe in fostering an environment where a diversity of perspectives can thrive. We proactively work to design hiring processes that promote equity and inclusion while mitigating bias. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building a team that reflects the communities we serve. We welcome and encourage qualified applicants, from all backgrounds, who are excited to contribute to our mission. 

As a step in strengthening our hiring process, we invite you to voluntarily provide information that will help inform and improve our inclusion efforts.

As a reminder, answering this question is entirely voluntary. Your response will remain confidential and intended solely for the purpose of improving our hiring process; and will not, in any way, be associated with your specific application or be used in the hiring decision.

questions.label: Will you now or in the future need visa sponsorship for the country in which you are applying?
What is your current annual base salary?
What is your expected annual base salary?
